content: --प्रसादः, --प्रसादनं [अंबूनि प्रसादयति] the clearing nut tree (कतक) Strychnos Potatorum (the nuts of this tree are used for purifying water; when rubbed on the inner surface of the vessel, they precipitate the impurities which the water contains; फलं कतकवृक्षस्य यद्यप्यंबुप्रसादकं . न नामग्रहणादेव तस्य वारि प्रसीदति).
